channel.title: Start OSRS or RS3 account from zero?
channel.description:
So i have two separate accounts , one has a good OSRS progress and the other a good RS3 progress but each one has no character on the other game for example my OSRS account has no progress at all on RS3 and the opposite. And i can't buy membership for both , my question is which one to ditch and start all over again?
Here is a comparison:
[img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/asdsadadsda_zpslxk2r0nv.png[/img]
just the mage tab: [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/dassad_zpssyhj7nfg.png[/img]
The osrs account has a decent bank too.
So what do you think?

item.title: Start OSRS or RS3 account from zero?
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

rs3 is easymode. You won’t have any problems.

Read full topic
item.source: Start OSRS or RS3 account from zero?

item.title: Start OSRS or RS3 account from zero?
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

Davidi2:

both accounts could be recreated in less than a month (except the 99 wc), so I wouldnt worry too much about it.

Ok i am ditching the osrs account , hopefully isn’t hard to achieve again as you said.

Read full topic
